attributes.action: Change the new MOT regulations to stop mot stations charging for a partial retest and allow more than one partial retest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Change the new MOT regulations to stop mot stations charging for a partial retest, and to also allow at least three partials retests before another full MOT is required. As the current system is a money making scheme for the MOT stations and is not based on making a vehicle roadworthy thus causing road users (especially those who can and do fix there own vehicles) who are already over taxed, over stretched, unfair costs.
